entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023
